text: int main ( ) { int c , k , l , n , t , sum , b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & b [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } c = 0 , sum = b [ 0 ] [ 0 ] , k = 0 , l = 0 ; while ( c < n ) { if ( b [ k + 1 ] [ l ] >= b [ k + 1 ] [ l + 1 ] && b [ k + 1 ] [ l ] >= b [ k + 1 ] [ l - 1 ] ) { sum += b [ k + 1 ] [ l ] ; k = k + 1 ; } else if ( b [ k + 1 ] [ l - 1 ] > b [ k + 1 ] [ l ] ) { sum += b [ k + 1 ] [ l - 1 ] ; k = k + 1 ; l = l - 1 ; } else if ( b [ k + 1 ] [ l + 1 ] > b [ k + 1 ] [ l ] ) { sum += b [ k + 1 ] [ l + 1 ] ; k = k + 1 ; l = l + 1 ; } c ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
